General.Name: Sat Nusapersada Tbk
General.Description: PT Sat Nusapersada Tbk provides electronic manufacturing services in Indonesia. The company offers stamping products, such as metal parts for automotive, control unit, energy storage, home appliances, industrial electronic, and other applications, as well as metal components; and plastic molding and assembling services. It also engages in software retailing and trading; fabrication; and vacuum forming activities. In addition, the company produces and distributes face masks. It operates in Japan, Singapore, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Malaysia, France, India, and the United States. PT Sat Nusapersada Tbk was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Batam, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl Pelita VI No.99, Batam, Indonesia, 29443
